mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OSHIRASE ( KIGYO_CD, SHAIN_UID, SHAIN_NO, TSUCHI_YMD, TSUCHI_HM, TSUCHISHA_KIGYO_CD, TSUCHISHA_CD, SHINSEI_NO, OSHIRASE_NAIYO, KENGEN, HAISHIN_KBN, ADD_USER_ID, ADD_DATE, UPD_USER_ID, UPD_DATE ) VALUES ( #{kigyoCd}, #{shainUid}, #{shainNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tsuchiYmd}, #{tsuchiHm}, #{tsuchishaKigyoCd}, #{tsuchishaCd}, #{shinseiNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{oshiraseNaiyo, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{kengen, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{haishinKbn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addUserId}, #{addDate}, #{updUserId}, #{updDate} )
